headline: Electric Upgrades Boost Reliability for McKean County Customers
summary: FirstEnergy Pennsylvania Electric Company (FE PA), a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) known in northwestern Pennsylvania as Penelec, has completed a major upgrade in McKean County to provide more reliable and resilient electric service for more than 1,000 Bradford and Bradford Township customers.

content.title: Electric Upgrades Boost Reliability for McKean County Customers
content.summary: FirstEnergy Pennsylvania Electric Company (FE PA), a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) known in northwestern Pennsylvania as Penelec, has completed a major upgrade in McKean County to provide more reliable and resilient electric service for more than 1,000 Bradford and Bradford Township customers.

thumbnail.caption: FirstEnergy Pennsylvania crews recently installed new underground lines that connect to the Bradford West Substation. These new lines can carry more power, which helps make the system stronger and more reliable. They also give grid operators more flexibility to switch customers to a different line if thereâ€™s ever an issue with the one that normally serves their home or business.
